channel.title: Server help ~-[317]-~
channel.description:
Hi, it's me Owner blitz of my server, i will not tell you IP or Client information yet untill my question is answered, Sorry. Well i don't know how to place permanent NPC's and create my own shop's and stuff and make Drop's. If you can tell me the answer I will Give you 30% CREDIT! Thanks , and you will be mensioned in my server when you log in. ~--BTW--~ Staff: OWNER's- Owner Blitz & Elel302 (CODER) CO-OWNER's- NONE! (We need some so if you're the one who answers my question, you'r luck is HIGH!) ADMIN's- Dylan0148 & Mod Nay (We need 1 more!) MOD's- NONE! (We need 5!) SERVER INF: [317] Donator shop - D plate, D claws, D full, D legs (t), Killer sword (bonus 709 str and best weap in game), Killer phat & mask & LOADS MORE! :D
GUYS!!!! PLEASE ANSWER MY QUESTION!! THANK YOU SO MUCH! :)

item.title: Server help ~-[317]-~
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“L0ST PK3R, post:1, topic:289812”]i will not tell you IP or Client information yet untill my question is answered, Sorry.[/quote]No thanks, either way no one wants to know.

Open up autospawn.cfg and you will understand (hopefully) how to place permanent NPCs.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help ~-[317]-~
item.dc:creator: @I_kasoy_II Sohail
item.description:
@I_kasoy_II wrote:

Hello,

Oke for the npc’s i think u need to go to npc.cfg and just copy another one there.
And just modify it to ur npc and coords compile and restart and ur done.

For shops.
Go into shops.cfg copy another shop modify it for urself like adding id if ur npc and the rest is self explaining.

If u still don’t get it.
Is suggest u use this.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search2

Read full topic
